biocontainers.name: pyopenms-extra-Fabian-Yannik-Laura
biocontainers.summary: pyOpenMS are the Python bindings to the OpenMS open-source C++ library for LC-MS data management and analyses. The Python bindings cover a large part of the OpenMS API to enable rapid algorithm development and workflow development. pyOpenMS supports the Proteomics Standard Initiative (PSI) formats for MS data. These utils contain documentation, installation instructions and example code that show the different functions of pyOpenMS.
